_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The beginning of skillful qualities [sn4: Give up bad conduct by way of body
Give up bad conduct by way of speech
Give up bad conduct by way of mind
Develop good conduct by way of body
Develop good conduct by way of speech
Develop good conduct by way of mind
The four kinds of mindfulness meditation: Meditate observing an aspect of the body
Meditate observing an aspect of feelings
Meditate observing an aspect of mind
Meditate observing an aspect of principles
